Sept. 10, 1892 D Hawick Contest
Hawick Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
hawick-contest
None
Buccleuch Park, Hawick Promoted by Hawick Saxhorn Band Source: Glasgow Herald (Glasgow, Scotland), Monday, September 12, 1892; Issue 219. Prizes: £25, £14, £8, £5, £3 Adjudicator Edwin Swift is also listed as having conducted at Stamford in Lincolnshire on this day, also attested by newspaper report. Both cannot be right! http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/stamford-contest/1892-09-10/ 7 bands competed
